text: (hazrat) Muhammad (PBUH) sirf rasool hi hain inn say pehlay boht say rasool ho chukay hain kiya agar inn ka intiqal hojaye ya yeh shaheed hojayen to tum islam say apni aeyrhiyon kay ball phir jaogay? Aur jo koi phir jaye apni aeyrhiyon per to hergiz Allah Taalaa ka kuch na bigaray ga un-qarib Allah Taalaa shukar guzaron ko nek badla dey ga
